column5: A couple trips out on Erie's north shore since the opener have produced some nice Smallmouth.  This little piggie hit a spinnerbait in 4 fow on Opening day.        This morning in the drizzle they were taking topwaters eagerly        The sun came out and they became a bit harder to make eat, but we found some that were willing, Rattlebaits and Spinnerbaits burned fast were the lure of choice!
Beauty fish!!  Some of those smallies are tanks! Well done.
Whenever I see Lake Erie and smallies in the same title, I always expect to see big smallies. Great job!
Some awesome Lake Erie bronze tanks !!!!  Love the colors on them smallies man !!  I gotta get down that way and try Erie one day !!!!! Thanks for sharing    Tight-lines.     Shawn
